context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,RCT - Single Sitting,
review: Capital Dental Care is clean and positive environment, doctor was always on time for appointments and she does excellent work. She also has all the latest technology available and is really good about educating her patients about oral hygiene. The prices are also really reasonable for root canal.

*** ****** ** ** *** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** *** She really takes the time to understand a patient's needs and she never rushes the appointments. She has such a gentle touch that I feel completely at ease when talking about my dental problems with her. Highly Recommended Good Dentist in our chandanagar area.

I wanted to thank you all for making my experience at the Capital Dental Clinic a good one. I was looking for a place that could provide me with Invisalign and endodontics, and they were the only ones that could, with a good price point. The staff was both knowledgeable and friendly, as well as accommodating to my needs. I'm glad I found Capital Dental Clinic.

I had to do a root canal treatment and I wasn't sure about the whole experience. The first dentist I went to was terrible; he tried to make me feel like it was all my fault. When I came here, the staff were really nice and they explained everything very well. The root canal wasn't painful at all. **** ** *** **** ****** ****** ** *********** **********

Would Definitely recommend to everyone. She knows her stuff very well!
